mmt_image
Class MMTImageComputer

java.lang.Object
  mmt_image.MMTImageComputer

public class MMTImageComputer
extends java.lang.Object

this class provides several static methods for MMTImages like getHistogram(), contrastStrecher(), gammaCorrection(),...

Author:
Mürzl Harald

Constructor Summary
MMTImageComputer()
           
 
Method Summary
static MMTImage contrastStretcher(MMTImage img)
          returns an image with the content of img stretched from 0 to 255.
static MMTImage gammaCorrection(MMTImage img, double gamma)
          returns the gamma corrected image of img. pixels greater than 255 will be limited to 255;
static int[] getHistogram(MMTImage img)
          creates the histogram of an MMTImage and returns the data as an integer array.
 
Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object
equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
 

Constructor Detail

MMTImageComputer

public MMTImageComputer()
Method Detail

getHistogram

public static int[] getHistogram(MMTImage img)
creates the histogram of an MMTImage and returns the data as an integer array.
index 0 shows the nr of pixels with value 0, index 2.... , up to 255
note: this method only supports images with an max gray value of 255.

Parameters:
img - MMTImage
Returns:
int[] the histogram as an array of Integer.

contrastStretcher

public static MMTImage contrastStretcher(MMTImage img)
returns an image with the content of img stretched from 0 to 255.

Parameters:
img - MMTImage, the image to stretch.
Returns:
MMTImage

gammaCorrection

public static MMTImage gammaCorrection(MMTImage img,
                                       double gamma)
returns the gamma corrected image of img. pixels greater than 255 will be limited to 255;

Parameters:
img - MMTImage
gamma - double
Returns:
MMTImage
